title: Pumpkin curry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon cooking oil', '2 onions, chopped', '1 cooking apple - peeled, cored and chopped', '3 heaped teaspoons curry powder', '1 tablespoon plain flour', 'water to moisten', '900g (2 lb) pumpkin, peeled and chopped', '2 medium-sized potatoes, peeled and chopped', '2 chillies, seeded and chopped']
